title: Authentic Competitive Podcasting
dc:creator: Jon Smajda
description: What deep sociological insights about race, nationalism, and culture can be gleaned from the world of competitive hot dog eating? We try really hard — possibly too hard — to provide an answer to that question. Then we turn our attention to Nerdcore hip hop and a discussion about music, race, identity, and authenticity. So […]
content:encoded:
What deep sociological insights about race, nationalism, and culture can be gleaned from the world of competitive hot dog eating? We try really hard — possibly too hard — to provide an answer to that question. Then we turn our attention to Nerdcore hip hop and a discussion about music, race, identity, and authenticity.

So put this on a bun and eat it: episode #8!
itunes:subtitle: Authentic Competitive Podcasting
itunes:summary:
[1]What deep sociological insights about race, nationalism, and culture can be gleaned from the world of competitive hot dog eating? We try really hard -- possibly too hard -- to provide an answer to that question. Then we turn our attention to Nerdcore hip hop [2] and a discussion about music, race, identity, and authenticity.

So put this on a bun and eat it: episode #8 [3]!
